item.title: My First Post
item.description: Introduction This is my first post using Hugo as platform. The idea its to post here my discoveries about home-smart and also from my programing life. So as start im going to post about Hugo. This is a tool to create static content, that means no javascript o compilation when any one do a request to the server. So all you need its a little of time, learn MD and use github pages.
